scripts.build-prod: rm build/* && esbuild src/stylesheet.css --minify --outfile=build/stylesheet.css && cp src/upsell_panda.js build/upsell_panda.js && esbuild build/upsell_panda.js --minify --bundle --outfile=dist/upsell_panda.min.js --loader:.css=text --define:process.env.APP_URL="'www.upsellpanda.com'"
scripts.build-dev: rm build/* && esbuild src/stylesheet.css --minify --outfile=build/stylesheet.css && cp src/upsell_panda.js build/upsell_panda.js && esbuild build/upsell_panda.js --minify --bundle --outfile=build/upsell_panda.dev.js --loader:.css=text --define:process.env.APP_URL="'localhost:3000'"
